alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 11:17PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Toombs, Telfair, southeastern Wilcox, southern Wheeler and central Montgomery Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1117 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Cobbtown to near Hazlehurst, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McRae, Lyons, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Lumber City, Uvalda, Ailey, Scotland, Higgston, Santa Claus, Alston, Jacksonville, Towns, Ohoopee, Horse Creek Wma, New Branch, Spring Hill, McNatt Falls, South Thompson and English Eddy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
